Package model

Class RepresentationConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.RepresentationConverter
  • public class RepresentationConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods to convert an RGB representation to HSL and back and print those results. Feel free to change these methods as required.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RepresentationConverter()
      create an empty representation converter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Converts an HSL representation where.
      java.lang.String convertRGBtoHSL​(double r, double g, double b)
      Convers an RGB representation in the range 0-1 into an HSL.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RepresentationConverter

        public RepresentationConverter()
        create an empty representation converter.

    • Method Detail

      • convertRGBtoHSL

        public java.lang.String convertRGBtoHSL​(double r,
                                        double g,
                                        double b)
        Convers an RGB representation in the range 0-1 into an HSL. representation where
        • 0 <= H < 360
        • 0 <= S <= 1
        • 0 <= L <= 1
        Parameters:
        r - red value of the RGB between 0 and 1
        g - green value of the RGB between 0 and 1
        b - blue value of the RGB between 0 and 1
        Returns:
        the resulting HSL values as a String

      • convertHSLtoRGB

        public java.lang.String convertHSLtoRGB​(double hue,
                                        double saturation,
                                        double lightness)
        Converts an HSL representation where.
        • 0 <= H < 360
        • 0 <= S <= 1
        • 0 <= L <= 1
        into an RGB representation where each component is in the range 0-1
        Parameters:
        hue - hue of the HSL representation
        saturation - saturation of the HSL representation
        lightness - lightness of the HSL representation
        Returns:
        the resulting RGB values as a String
